scripts.build: mkdir -p build && node -e 'process.stdout.write("var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\"; export * from \"../index\"; export {version};");' > build/bundle.js && rollup -c rollup.config.js -f umd --amd.id d3-example-bar-chart-plugin -n d3_example_bar_chart_plugin -o build/d3-example-bar-chart-plugin.js -- build/bundle.js
scripts.archive: rm -f build/d3-example-bar-chart-plugin.zip && zip -j build/d3-example-bar-chart-plugin.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-example-bar-chart-plugin.js build/d3-example-bar-chart-plugin.min.js
scripts.version: npm run build && npm run minify && git add build/d3-example-bar-chart-plugin.js build/d3-example-bar-chart-plugin.min.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && npm run minify && npm run archive
